trans-unit.source: Reads the specified file into an array.

seg-source.mrk: Reads the specified file into an array.

target.mrk: Reads the specified file into an array.

trans-unit.source: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen(). Alternatively you may use a string filename as the first parameter.

seg-source.mrk: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen().
Alternatively you may use a string filename as the first parameter.

target.mrk: The handle of a file, as returned by a previous call to FileOpen().
Alternatively you may use a string filename as the first parameter.

trans-unit.source: a 1 dimension array containing one line of text per element and @extended set to the number of lines read.

seg-source.mrk: a 1 dimension array containing one line of text per element and @extended set to the number of lines read.

target.mrk: a 1 dimension array containing one line of text per element and @extended set to the number of lines read.

trans-unit.source: Use @extended or UBound() to determine the number of lines read.

seg-source.mrk: Use @extended or UBound() to determine the number of lines read.

target.mrk: Use @extended or UBound() to determine the number of lines read.

trans-unit.source: Read the current script file into an array using the filepath.

seg-source.mrk: Read the current script file into an array using the filepath.

target.mrk: Read the current script file into an array using the filepath.

trans-unit.source: There was an error reading the file. @error:

seg-source.mrk: There was an error reading the file.

target.mrk: There was an error reading the file.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred reading the current script file.

seg-source.mrk: An error occurred reading the current script file.

target.mrk: An error occurred reading the current script file.

trans-unit.source: Display the contents of the array.

seg-source.mrk: Display the contents of the array.

target.mrk: Display the contents of the array.
